Ayesha's unwavering support, even encouraging Stephen to finish his degree before the NBA draft, solidified his decision to marry her. Their enduring marriage has weathered public scrutiny, with Stephen consistently crediting his wife.

title: US visa: H-1B workers, H-4 holder to undergo social-media screening; System gets tighter
description: The US State Department has tightened visa vetting, requiring H-1B workers and their H-4 dependents to undergo social media screening. Applicants must now set all social media profiles to public for enhanced background checks, a move aimed at strengthening national security and ensuring visa eligibility.

title: Nvidia responds to DeepSeek report; denies claims of ‘banned’ chips behind January market rout
description: Nvidia has refuted claims that Chinese AI firm DeepSeek is using smuggled, restricted Blackwell chips. The report alleged DeepSeek acquired these advanced processors, banned for export to China, to train its AI models. Nvidia stated they have no evidence of such illicit activities, emphasizing their commitment to preventing circumvention of US trade restrictions.

title: Bukayo Saka & Tolami Benson Net Worth 2025: Earnings, brands and lifestyle
description: Arsenal star Bukayo Saka is a financial powerhouse, with his net worth projected around $30 million by 2025, fueled by his lucrative club contract and major endorsement deals. His partner, Tolami Benson, also boasts an independent career in public relations and investments, contributing to their combined financial standing. Saka's marketability continues to soar.

title: Inside Connor McDavid’s luxury car collection: supercars, favorites and more
description: Hockey superstar Connor McDavid's impressive car collection mirrors his on-ice prowess. Featuring a diverse range from the roaring Lamborghini Huracán and precise Audi R8 to the luxurious Range Rover Vogue and powerful Chevrolet Camaro ZL1, his fleet showcases speed, precision, and personality. The Porsche 911 GT2 RS stands out as his favorite, embodying his passion for high-performance engineering.
